com.nhn.android.maps.maplib

Class NGeoPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.maplib.NGeoPoint

  • public class NGeoPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class representing a pair of latitude and longitude in GRS coordinates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double latitude 
      double longitude 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      NGeoPoint(double longitude, double latitude)
      Constructs a NGeoPoint with the given latitude and longitude in GRS coordinates
      NGeoPoint(int longitudeE6, int latitudeE6)
      Constructs a NGeoPoint with the given latitude and longitude, measured in microdegrees (degrees * 1E6).
